short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace your new tab page with beautiful wallpapers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to upload images offline, which can be set as the background of a new tab. You can also shuffle these images as your background.
In "delete mode", you can click on the images you do not want and then click the "delete" button to remove them.
